All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Controller
Controller.java is the class that the FXML file reads methods from, and contains wrappers for all necessary methods.
Display
Display.java handles displaying content in the application, including images, canvases, popup windows, etc.
Edit
Edit.java contains the methods for image editing, drawing, etc.
fileIO
fileIO.java implements basic file I/O methods that are then passed into Controller.java.
Main
Main.java is solely used for launching the application window.
Menu
Menu.java contains methods configuring the various JavaFX and SceneBuilder menus, boxes, and buttons.
